Datasets.description: Training, validation and testing datasets used for the model

Data Preprocessing Code.description: Code for data cleansing, normalization, and augmentation

Model Architecture.description: Well commented code for the model's architecture

Model Parameters.description: Trained model parameters, weights and biases

Model Metadata.description: Any model metadata including training configuration and optimizer state

Training Code.description: Code used for training the model

Inference Code.description: Code used for running the model to make predictions

Evaluation Code.description: Code used for evaluating the model

Evaluation Data.description: Data used for evaluating the model

Evaluation Results.description: The results from evaluating the model

Supporting Libraries and Tools.description: Libraries and tools used in the model's development

Model Card.description: Model details including performance metrics, intended use, and limitations

Data Card.description: Documentation for datasets including source, characteristics, and preprocessing details

Technical Report.description: Technical report detailing capabilities and usage instructions for the model

Research Paper.description: Research paper detailing the development and capabilities of the model

Sample Model Outputs.description: Examples of outputs generated by the model
